name: Alex Michaelides
bio: Alex Michaelides is a British-Cypriot author best known for his debut novel 'The Silent Patient'.

name: Tara Westover
bio: Tara Westover is an American memoirist, essayist, and historian. She is known for her memoir 'Educated'.

name: Michelle Obama
bio: Michelle Obama is an American attorney and author who served as the first lady of the United States from 2009 to 2017.

name: Margaret Atwood
bio: Margaret Atwood is a Canadian poet, novelist, literary critic, and essayist, known for 'The Handmaid's Tale'.

name: Delia Owens
bio: Delia Owens is an American author and zoologist, known for her debut novel 'Where the Crawdads Sing'.

name: Celeste Ng
bio: Celeste Ng is an American writer and novelist. She is the author of 'Little Fires Everywhere'.

name: Erin Morgenstern
bio: Erin Morgenstern is an American multimedia artist and author of 'The Night Circus'.

name: Sally Rooney
bio: Sally Rooney is an Irish author and screenwriter, known for her novels 'Normal People' and 'Conversations with Friends'.

name: Frank Herbert
bio: Frank Herbert was an American science-fiction author best known for the 'Dune' series.

name: George Orwell
bio: George Orwell was an English novelist and essayist, journalist and critic, known for his novels '1984' and 'Animal Farm'.

name: J.D. Salinger
bio: J.D. Salinger was an American writer best known for his novel 'The Catcher in the Rye'.

name: Cormac McCarthy
bio: Cormac McCarthy was an American novelist, playwright, and screenwriter, known for 'The Road' and 'No Country for Old Men'.

name: Paulo Coelho
bio: Paulo Coelho is a Brazilian lyricist and novelist, known for his novel 'The Alchemist'.

name: J.K. Rowling
bio: J.K. Rowling is a British author, best known for writing the 'Harry Potter' series.

name: J.R.R. Tolkien
bio: J.R.R. Tolkien was an English writer, poet, and academic, known for 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings'.

name: Harper Lee
bio: Harper Lee was an American novelist, known for her novel 'To Kill a Mockingbird'.

name: Aldous Huxley
bio: Aldous Huxley was an English writer and philosopher, known for his dystopian novel 'Brave New World'.

name: Ray Bradbury
bio: Ray Bradbury was an American author and screenwriter, best known for his dystopian novel 'Fahrenheit 451'.

name: F. Scott Fitzgerald
bio: F. Scott Fitzgerald was an American novelist, known for his novel 'The Great Gatsby'.

name: Herman Melville
bio: Herman Melville was an American novelist, best known for 'Moby Dick'.
